Name: Rogue Port - Blue Nightmare
About the game: 'Rogue Port - Blue Nightmare' is a modern action-based RPG and sequel to 'Rogue Port - Red Nightmare' a turn-based modern RPG. Features Include : - Full Controller Support. - Learn New and Valuable Skills and Grow in Power as your Player Level Progresses. - Find Useful Items that can Help your Player Character Reach New Places and Unexplored Areas. - Secret Chest Revealed After Defeating Every Enemy on a Single Map. - Day and Night Calendar Time System with Dynamic Tinting for Exterior Cells. - Dynamic Music System for Select Maps. - Play a Bass Guitar, Song of Inversion and Explore the Inverted Realm. - Horizontally Inverted Exterior Maps Featured from 'Rogue Port - Red Nightmare'. - Playable Archery Mini Game with Varying Courses and Rewards. - Integrated Unlockable Features between both 'Rogue Port - Red Nightmare' and 'Rogue Port - Blue Nightmare'. - Over 300 Maps and 5 Boss Filled Dungeons to Explore with Hidden Treasures.
